A classic between classics that never gets old.

An amazing sequel to one of the best shooters ever made, which is insane because I thought no sequel could beat the original Half-Life. I was wrong. Half-Life 2 improves on pretty much everything in the first, and its still super fun to play today. Great story, characters, levels, graphics and fun setpieces. 

Without this game, Valve wouldn't be around today, and that's saying something. This is a brilliant game. Now we just have to wait for Half-Life 3.
Recién me paso los 2 juegos en la misma semana H1 y 2 una maravilla, recomendados al maximo... una experiencia inolvidable Gracias Valve

Мда, ну игра без преувеличений хорошая, сюжет прекрасен, лор загадочен и довольно неплохой, графику упоминать не буду, всё таки игра 2004 года, но на своё время это был ещё тот прорыв (наверно), внимание к мелочам и различные пасхалки тоже присутствуют и радуют людей и по сей день, уже почти 20 лет ждали 3 часть, пока VALVE делали сурс 2 и готовили новую игру, надеюсь что со слюдущей частью ХЛ2 они не обосрутся и сделают продолжение, а не новую игру

fuuck me last time I played was 2013, always find canals a bit of a slog (may be cause I played those section more than any other) but after that had more fun than any other game I've played in the last few years.
Definitely better than gta, rdr2, witcher 3 or cyberpunk not really sure any single player game can hold a candle.

Despite myself not having enough intelligence, this game is a good nostalgic shooter, the story of Half-Life 2 is very interesting and so are the enemy forces being the Combine with interesting outfits, different tactics if with a squad and not to forget that most of the Civil Protection outfits are based off of actual Russian uniforms. That's all I really got, I would explain more but I need to play the game more and such. As of said great game, 10/10.
